newsitem.title: BULGARIA: ONE REPO DEAL ON BULGARIA BOURSE, RABSI UNCHANGED.
newsitem.headline: ONE REPO DEAL ON BULGARIA BOURSE, RABSI UNCHANGED.

text.p: The RABSI (Reuter All Bulgaria Stock Index) was unchanged from Monday's 41.31 points as no corporate paper traded on Bulgarian stock exchanges, brokers said.
Teximbank shares were offered at 800 levs, still below par of 1,000 on the Bulgarian Stock Exchange (BSE), but there were no bids. Trakia Commerce paper were offered at 30 levs against par of 100.
TBS Hotels third issue shares were bid at 80 levs also on the BSE, well below the par of 1,000, but there were no offers.
One seven-day repo deal in treasury paper worth of 2.106 million levs was struck on the Sofia Stock Exchange, yielding 1.90 percent until repurchase.
No shares were bid or offered on the SSE today.
RABSI has been calculated on a daily basis since February 1994. -- Rumen Sokolov, Sofia Newsroom, 359-2-84561
